content: निधानं {@--1@} Putting down, laying down, depositing. {@--2@} Keeping, preserving. {@--3@} A place where anything is placed, a receptacle, reservoir; निधानं धर्माणां <ls>G. L. 18.</ls> {@--4@} Treasure; निधानगर्भामिव सागरांबरां <ls>R. 3. 9</ls>; <ls>Bg. 9. 18.</ls>; विद्यैव लोकस्य परं निधानं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--5@} Hoard, store, property, wealth. {@--6@} A place of cessation or rest.
